channel.title: Best of Moyles
channel.description: The best of the Chris Moyles show from BBC Radio 1. Weekly highlights taken from the breakfast show, as broadcast by Chris and team every morning on Radio 1 from 7am to 10am.
channel.itunes:author: BBC Radio 1

item.title: 2006/01/13 - Davina McCall, Coogan & Brydon
item.description: Chris chats to Davina about Celebrity Big Brother, Steve Coogan and Rob Brydon provide some genius impressions, and the team talk darts.
item.itunes:subtitle: 2006/01/13 - Davina McCall, Coogan & Brydon
item.itunes:summary: Chris chats to Davina about Celebrity Big Brother, Steve Coogan and Rob Brydon provide some genius impressions, and the team talk darts.
